scripts.test: lab -v -L -P test -t 90 -I __core-js_shared__ -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/coverage.html
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.repo-check: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && [[ '' == `git tag --list v${REPO_VERSION}` ]]
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run repo-check && npm run clean && npm i --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && npm run prettier && npm test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run repo-check && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test && npm run doc && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org
